page.title: 16A day in Robt.Irving's life
page.content: I get up at 7.45 am. I dress then have breakfast. After a breakfast of 2 biscuits and coffee I clean my teeth and go to the toilet. I watch television until about 8.25 am. Then I go to school on my bicycle. At 9.00 am I go to registration where attendance is checked. At 9.05 am I go to my first class. I get 5 different subjects each day at Castle-Douglas High School. At 3.45 pm I go home. When I get home I change and go outside to play football. About 6.00 pm I have my tea. After tea I do my homework. If time permits I go out to play until 9.00 pm. Then I wash, get into my pyjamas and go to bed.
